statements: SELECT * FROM social_analysis;
SELECT id, developer_name, issue, analysis_date FROM social_analysis;
SELECT developer_name, issue FROM social_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT developer_name FROM social_analysis;
SELECT developer_name, issue FROM social_analysis;
SELECT * FROM social_analysis WHERE developer_name = 'John' AND analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(analysis_date) AS latest_analysis_date FROM social_analysis;
SELECT developer_name, COUNT(issue) AS total_issues FROM social_analysis GROUP BY developer_name;
SELECT * FROM social_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC, developer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SocialIssues;
SELECT issue_name, issue_category FROM SocialIssues WHERE issue_category = 'Environment';
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM SocialIssues ORDER BY issue_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(id) AS total_issues FROM SocialIssues;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description, issue_category FROM SocialIssues WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM SocialIssues WHERE issue_category = 'Environment';
SELECT issue_name, issue_category FROM SocialIssues WHERE id = 5;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM AnalysisResults WHERE social_issue_id = 3 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, analysis_result FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description, issue_category FROM SocialIssues;
SELECT issue_name, issue_category FROM social_trends;
SELECT issue_name, trend_score FROM social_trends ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT issue_name, issue_category, trend_score FROM social_trends WHERE trend_score > 50;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM developer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT issue_name, strategy FROM social_trends JOIN strategic_planning ON social_trends.issue_id = strategic_planning.issue_id;
SELECT issue_name, issue_category, trend_score FROM social_trends WHERE issue_category = 'Health' ORDER BY trend_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM developer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT issue_name, strategy FROM social_trends INNER JOIN strategic_planning ON social_trends.issue_id = strategic_planning.issue_id WHERE strategy = 'Agile' ORDER BY issue_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT issue_id, AVG(trend_score) AS avg_score FROM social_trends GROUP BY issue_id HAVING avg_score > 4 ORDER BY avg_score DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT issue_name, trend_score, feedback_text FROM social_trends LEFT JOIN developer_feedback ON social_trends.issue_id = developer_feedback.issue_id WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY trend_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM social_issues_analysis;
SELECT issue_title, description FROM social_issues_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, created_at FROM social_issues_analysis WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY analyzed_at DESC;
SELECT analyzed_by, analysis_result FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM social_issues_analysis ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT trend_name, analyzed_by FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM strategic_planning WHERE LENGTH(plan_description) > 100;
SELECT intervention_name, implemented_by FROM interventions WHERE implemented_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT issue_title, description, location FROM social_issues_analysis WHERE issue_title LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT * FROM DeveloperAnalysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT issue_name, description FROM SocialIssues WHERE id = 2;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM StrategicPlanning WHERE id = 3;
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_type FROM Interventions WHERE id = 4;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Trends WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM SocialIssues WHERE id = 1;
SELECT issue_name, description FROM SocialIssues WHERE affected_population = 'Children';
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_type FROM Interventions ORDER BY intervention_type DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Trends JOIN DeveloperAnalysis ON Trends.analysis_id = DeveloperAnalysis.id WHERE DeveloperAnalysis.developer_id = 3;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date, strategy_description FROM StrategicPlanning WHERE end_date >= '2023-01-01';
